banner.title: Refer a Friend
banner.subtitle: Refer a friend and earn <0>{{percent}}</0> commission from the house edge on all of their bets!

modal.title: How do referrals work?
modal.description: Refer a friend to Sandcasino and earn free money from all of their bets!

item1.title: Step 1
item1.description: Have a friend that would love Sandcasino? Help them sign up using your Referral Link, or your Code, and they will be counted as your referral!

item2.title: Step 2
item2.description: You will earn 10% commission from the house edge on all bets placed by your referrals whether they win or lose.

item3.title: Step 3
item3.description: Your referral earnings are immediately available to be claimed!
